bug.author: sargismkhitaryan
bug.description: Please provide an example, documentation for tensorflow audio recognition on iOS as you provide on Android <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/SpeechActivity.java>(example).</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thank you for your post. We noticed you have not filled out the following field in the issue template. Could you update them if they are relevant in your case, or leave them as N/A? Thanks. Have I written custom code OS Platform and Distribution TensorFlow installed from TensorFlow version Bazel version CUDA/cuDNN version GPU model and memory Exact command to reproduce Mobile device

Have I written custom code - NO OS Platform and Distribution - iOS TensorFlow installed from - <denchmark-link:url>https://www.tensorflow.org</denchmark-link>
TensorFlow version - r1.8 Bazel version - N/A CUDA/cuDNN version - N/A GPU model and memory - N/A Exact command to reproduce - N/A Mobile device - iOS
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/petewarden>@petewarden</denchmark-link> Can you take a look at this?
We're actively working on porting the Android samples to iOS. Stay tuned!
Targeting a release before the end of the year.

The iOS audio sample can be found @ <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/examples/tree/master/lite/examples/speech_commands/ios>https://github.com/tensorflow/examples/tree/master/lite/examples/speech_commands/ios</denchmark-link> . Feedback is welcome.
